```{r}

picture <- image_graph(width = 1500, height = 1100)
annotation_custom2 <- 
function (grob, xmin = -Inf, xmax = Inf, ymin = -Inf, ymax =Inf, data) 
{
  layer(data = data, stat = StatIdentity, position = PositionIdentity, 
        geom = ggplot2:::GeomCustomAnn, 
        inherit.aes = TRUE, params = list(grob = grob, 
                                          xmin = xmin, xmax = xmax, 
                                          ymin = ymin, ymax = ymax))
}

ggplot()+theme_void()
    
dev.off()
img <- image_draw(picture)

grid.raster(plot1, .19, .35, height =.75)
grid.raster(plot2, .84, .35, height = .75)
grid.raster(plot3, .525, .37, height = .75)
```
